phrases: So, Taihei... can I come by your place for dinner tonight?
Say, why do not you come as well, Alex?
This was your BOSS asking you out.
like I have seen him somewhere before.
Everything's pretty much in season, so it should taste good.
Well, autumn is the time for eating!
Tonight's a parade of autumn specials!
It is the anime song festival!
He does not even live here, but he is really getting worked up!
I know this feeling, of someone being all excited but not caring about ME.
Japanese animation is cute and cool!
My older brother loves it, too.
Now that I look closely, he TOTALLY seems like he could be her brother!
But, wait, that is too much of a coincidence!
I do not watch anime at all.
Is not that just for kids?
Anime is a part of Japanese culture!
This HAS to be Sylphyn's brother!
This was a quality show, and I am sad to see it end!
I have been a fan of the show too!
I have got the merch and the Blu-rays and everything!
Only, yappari Japan ga suki desu wa Only, sure enough, I love Japan
Ichiban ga ichiban oniai no Only the best for the best!
Ichiban ga ichiban oniai no Only the best for the best!
Kisoiai futari, yuujou wa Our friendship, the two of us competing
Kisoiai futari, yuujou wa Our friendship, the two of us competing
Utsukushii mono desu wa Is a beautiful thing
Looks like they have suddenly become friends...
If you will excuse me, I should get going.
Umaru, you certainly know a lot about anime.
You are no slacker yourself, Alex.
Is it all right if I come by with some of my favorite Blu-Rays sometime?
It looked like Alex had a good time too.
Even at the office, Alex just seems sort of OFF, right?
Well, they did bring him on as a special hire...
Wait, why WAS he a special hire?
I have made contact... with Umaru Doma.
Is not your reaction sort of LACKING?
Acting like spies should be more fun, right?!
If you are going to use my ear pick, you could at least give it back.
I told her to give it back...
I guess I will just... buy one on the way home.
My ear's all itchy, but the ear pick is gone!
And it should be right here!
Something is making me feel all creepy-crawly!
Looks like we will not be seeing that stick today, huh, Boss?
The time has come for her to know how much we despise that stick's daily intrusion!
Go and give her the greatest itch you can.
Go and give her the greatest itch you can.
I have some shopping to do.
I stepped on my ear pick and broke it.
Umaru used it and left it lying out...
Tanukichi must have it rough right now, huh?
But it is right after you use it that the itching is worst.
But my finger cannot go all the way in!
I told you Tanukichi would be suffering...
It is your own fault for not putting things away, Umaru.
Whatever, just hand it over, Bomba!
We bought one of each that they had at the store.
Bomba said he wanted to try out some different kinds...
Who knew there were so many different ear picks?
It is effective not just in one direction, but in ALL directions!
Each twist has three times the results, which means less work!
This will let you see the deepest parts of your ear,
for maximum focus yet little strain on your aural orifice!
And there are other options as well!
You are going to pay me back for all this stuff, right?
I have not tried them all yet, so I am not sure.
The only time someone cleans your ears for you is when you are a kid, right?
They say Umaru's brother is some totally handsome actor.
And supposedly, her dad is German!
My dad's German... and Taihei is a handsome actor?
My dad's German... and Taihei is a handsome actor?
My dad's German... and Taihei is a handsome actor?
I do not know where these rumors are coming from, but they keep spreading and changing...
I have kept you waiting indeed!
I wish to ask your advice on something...
You know, I did not think Sylphyn would be the type to sit down and talk like this, but...
sure enough, you cannot trust every rumor you hear.
Sorry, I did not catch what you said.
UMR, I would like to invite you over to my house today.
And we have hopscotch stepping stones!
It seems like it has some history to it.
Anime is a part of Japanese culture!
Sylphyn and Alex are brother and sister, right?
It is a weekday, so I guess he is not here.
It is right down this stairway, UMR!
Is she going to try something down there in the basement?
Indeed, we should study for our tests!
It is almost time for midterm exams.
I assume you have them at your school as well.
We do, but... wait, we are at the SAME school.
This time, I WILL get a better score than Umaru!
You really think you can beat me?
The Umaru you are talking about is right here in front of you...
Like, I read poetry in our house's library.
But this is a one-room apartment
This is what it will take to beat me!
I always study in our private library.
My father is German and my mother is Japanese!
They say Umaru's house has its own library.
I wonder if she studies poetry.
No, it is just... you cannot trust rumors, can you?
I would like to hear more of this indeed!
So, what sort of rumors are these, UMR?
It is not even time for spring cleaning yet!
It is about your attitude, and how you do not care how dirty things get.
This is a detox, for the soul!
I clean every week, but when the weekend comes, it is dirty again.
It is because you are being lazy!
You think it is okay to leave things messy and I will clean it up later.
But if I did not make a mess, you would have nothing to do on the weekends, right?
Why do I look all shriveled up?!
Cleaning Technique No. 1: Decide What Goes Where!
This place gets messy because things are just left scattered all over the floor.
That is why we have to decide where each and every item goes.
I would like you to use the bookshelves.
I wonder where Big Brother learned his technique...
We have pretty much figured out where things go, huh?
But there is a whole bunch still left over.
Cleaning Technique No. 2: Store Whatever Remains Left from Step 1!
If you cannot come up with a place for something, it means you do not use it much and you should store it.
Let us box up volumes of the same size and genre together.
But Big Brother, what genre is it if you have got a DVD inside of a game case?
Why do you have things all mixed up like that?
It is a pain to keep pulling discs out and putting them back in, so I just put them wherever...
Put them back in their proper cases!
Okay, that is everything nice and stored.
But if there is no more room to put stuff?
I mean, look how cute this doll thing is!
Listen closely, Umaru: All things are destined to meet their end!
Out with the old and in with the new!
This is the natural order of things!
Out with the old and in with the new!
This is the natural order of things!
The sticky note on this page here says the same thing that you are saying.
M-maybe I could keep that stuffed doll of yours on my desk...
Looks pretty clean, does not it?
All that is left is to see if you can keep things nice and neat.
I am bored of this game... oh, I know!
I will play one of those retro games that turned up yesterday.
It is fun to play these once in a while.
Why do you have things all mixed up like that?
Which case did this belong to...?
You can leave things a LITTLE messy...
Are you going somewhere on Sunday?
We are going to the movies!
This is a big crowd indeed!
It is been a while since I have seen a movie at the theater.
Should we watch it first, or...?
Well, it is almost lunch time.
Sylphyn has already bought popcorn and is standing in line!
And I have bought popcorn for everyone!
We were talking about getting something to eat first...
YOU-um, maybe we COULD see the movie first.
There sure are a lot of movies out, huh?
That has not come out yet.
It is so sweet and delicious!
They all look good... it is hard to choose one, is not it?
Master Detective Nacon seems pretty popular.
I used to watch Nacon when I was in elementary school.
I would like to see Precuare!
You already bought the promotional booklet!
That caters to an even younger audience...
Okay everyone, let us all raise our voices!
I think I would be a little embarrassed...
But I spent last night watching the old shows and practicing for this.
So long as I can be with the Master...
I am totally fine with this.
Let us just go with what everyone wants to watch.
I will see Precuare with UMR later!
We were lucky to find such good seats.
I never thought the four of us would be hanging out and watching a movie...
Still, I am glad we were all able to become friends.
I am just a little scared of the dark.
But I will be all right.
He goes to the movies and a bomb goes off!
Today, too, his deductive powers will leap into action!
And catastrophe awaits him at the restaurant!
Wow... so this is the restaurant run by that friend of Zonoko's uncle, huh?
I will be looking at all the clues that they drop and I will figure out the culprit!
I wonder what the others think...
But I spent last night watching the old shows and practicing for this.
Do not tell me she stayed up till morning watching all those seasons of Precuare!
My stomach is about to growl!
I cannot let that happen here - it is too embarrassing!
I am going to blow this restaurant up!
It looks like everyone was focused on the movie.
Nacon did a better job than me at figuring out the culprit, but...
That was a lot of fun!
Your ears will itch and itch again!
You know, not even I have seen an anime that has earwax in the next episode preview!
Those of you watching, you will be reduced to a piteous state and made to itch as well!
